headline: Better Artificial Intelligence Stock: AMD vs. Marvell Technology
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD) and Marvell Technology (NASDAQ: MRVL) have enjoyed contrasting fortunes on the stock market in 2024, with one of these names delivering stellar gains while the other one is in the red.  AMD has been playing second fiddle to Nvidia in the market for AI data center graphics processing units (GPUs).

headline: Prediction: AMD Stock Will Soar Over the Next 8 Years. Here's 1 Reason Why.
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD) stock has sold off in recent weeks.  Weak PC sales and worries about competition in the artificial intelligence (AI) accelerator market seem to have weighed on the stock.  Its $18 billion in revenue for the first nine months of 2024 rose 10%, far below the triple-digit revenue increases of its main rival, Nvidia.

headline: 3 Top Tech Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Searching for undervalued tech gems while rebalancing your portfolio for 2025? Here are three compelling tech stocks that could deliver big returns.
